title: Sylas doesn't apply nor proc Press the Attack from Passive
body: I dont think this is intentional due to other runes like Fleet of Footwork and Grasp being able to function just fine with his passive.

replies.body:
It's how you know Riot is an italian company.  They really love their spaghetti.

EDIT: Thinking about this "AoE Sheen Proc" that is his passive encouraged me to try Icebourn Gauntlet to see if Riot just can't figure that out.  Nope, IBG works with PTA if you are procing it's sheen attack.  lol
